alert.note: Alert for Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wood and southwestern Portage Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Pittsville, or 8 miles west of Wisconsin Rapids, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wisconsin Rapids around 625 PM CDT. Lake Wazeecha around 630 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Wisconsin.
